title: dhina dhayaparanE
sahitya:
dIna dayAparanE en kurai tIrtta divya krpAkaranE



anupallavi



mAnamillAdu vAzhnda hInan enakkum shiva jnAnam pazhutta dEva gAna

sukhattait-tanda



caraNam



pullEn un pugazhinai sholvEn padiyarivaik-kallEn kaTravar vazhi

nillEn pollEn enakkum

nalla tuNaiyAi oru shollaik-koDuttu maDat-tollai ellAm tavirtta tillai

sabhApatiyE
